description:
Batou is a main male character in the Ghost in the Shell series, the second best melee fighter in http://anidb.net/ch1590 [Section 9], and is the second in command under Major http://anidb.net/ch1582 [Kusanagi Motoko].
Batou had seemingly hated anyone who tries to make Section 9 fixing the mess of another organization, such as the AI hijacking of the Jigabachi choppers in the SAC series. In addition, he jokes around with a hint of irony being mentioned.
name: Batou
